synopsis.text: Kurosaki, a serene seaside town, is home to a modest, low-income housing complex known as Housing Complex C. The protagonist, Kimi, resides here, but her life is anything but tranquil. Misfortune clings to her like a shadow, and unsettling occurrences begin to disrupt the peace of the complex. Are these eerie incidents solely targeting Kimi, or is there a darker, more ancient malevolence plaguing the entire community? Unravel the chilling mysteries of Housing Complex C as the narrative unfolds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
